participant_1.background:
I'm close to my family and enjoy reading and spending time at the beach.
i live in texas.
i cannot go a single day without eating ice cream.
i speak fluent german.
i love to surf.

participant_2.background:
I spend my days reading mystery novels and exploring the mountains, but I usually wake up late.
my favorite music is jim hendrix.
i am a scientist.
my mom lives with me.
I start my day with a hearty stew, inspired by my idol, Thierry Henry.

content.text: Not bad, I am just chilling at home. What are you up to?
I'm currently reading a mystery novel and drinking some coffee.
That sounds like a relaxing way to spend the day. I love mysteries too. Are you reading anything good?
Yes, I'm reading "The Girl on the Train" by Paula Hawkins. It's really good so far.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should, it's a page-turner. So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, surf, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I've always wanted to learn how to surf.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be challenging at first.
I'm sure I could learn. I'm pretty good at picking up new things.
Well, if you're ever in Texas, I'll be happy to teach you.
That's a really nice offer. I'll definitely take you up on that.
Sounds good. I'm looking forward to it.
Me too. Have a great day!
